title: Drawing, "Design for Susanna and the Elders", 1660–1710
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, red and black chalk on cream laid paper, lined
inscribed: verso in graphite, center: Luca Giordano?; in graphite, right: 95; in graphite, lower left: [symbol for check mark]; in graphite, lower right: 1938.88.6547
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: At right, two men are climbing into a large round tub, presumably to spy on Susanna bathing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Susanna and the Elders", 1660–1710.
1660–1710. Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, red and black chalk on cream laid paper, lined. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6547.
